verses.text:
The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* my \w light|strong="H0216"\w* and my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*; whom shall I \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*? the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* the \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* of my \w life|strong="H2416"\w*; of whom shall I be \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w*?

When the \w wicked|strong="H7489"\w*, \add even\add* mine \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w* and my \w foes|strong="H0341"\w*, \w came|strong="H7126"\w* upon me to eat \w up|strong="H0398"\w* my \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, they \w stumbled|strong="H3782"\w* and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w*.\f + \fr 27.2 \ft came…: Heb. approached against me\f*

Though an \w host|strong="H4264"\w* should \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* against me, my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall not \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*: though \w war|strong="H4421"\w* should \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* against me, in this \add will\add* I \add be\add* \w confident|strong="H0982"\w*.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \add thing\add* have I \w desired|strong="H7592"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that will I \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* after; that I may \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of my \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, to \w behold|strong="H2372"\w* the \w beauty|strong="H5278"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and to \w enquire|strong="H1239"\w* in his \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.  +  r 27.4  t the beauty: or, the delight *

For in the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w* he shall \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* me in his \w pavilion|strong="H5520"\w*: in the \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* of his \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* shall he \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* me; he shall set me \w up|strong="H7311"\w* upon a \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*.

And now shall mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w* be lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w* above mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* me: therefore will I \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* in his \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of \w joy|strong="H8643"\w*; I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w*, yea, I will sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 27.6 \ft joy: Heb. shouting\f*

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add when\add* I \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* with my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: have \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* also upon me, and \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* me.

\add When thou saidst\add*, \w Seek|strong="H1245"\w* ye my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*; my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, will I \w seek|strong="H1245"\w*.\f + \fr 27.8 \ft When…: or, My heart said unto thee, Let my face seek thy face, etc\f*

\w Hide|strong="H5641"\w* not thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \add far\add* from me; \w put|strong="H5186"\w* not thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w away|strong="H5186"\w* in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*: thou hast been my \w help|strong="H5833"\w*; \w leave|strong="H5203"\w* me not, neither \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* me, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*.

When my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* me, then the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will take me \w up|strong="H0622"\w*.\f + \fr 27.10 \ft take…: Heb. gather me\f*

\w Teach|strong="H3384"\w* me thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* me in a \w plain|strong="H4334"\w* \w path|strong="H0734"\w*, because of mine \w enemies|strong="H8324"\w*.\f + \fr 27.11 \ft a plain…: Heb. a way of plainness\f*\f + \fr 27.11 \ft mine…: Heb. those which observe me\f*

\w Deliver|strong="H5414"\w* me not over unto the \w will|strong="H5315"\w* of mine \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*: for \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* are risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me, and such as breathe \w out|strong="H3307"\w* \w cruelty|strong="H2555"\w*.

\add I had fainted\add*, \w unless|strong="H3884"\w* I had \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w Wait|strong="H6960"\w* on the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: be of good \w courage|strong="H2388"\w*, and he shall \w strengthen|strong="H0553"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: \w wait|strong="H6960"\w*, I say, on the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
